title: Guard!
desc:
[gu]

Block 1 attack against anybody except yourself.

-# If fused to a card that places a wall, you get to specify which player to place it up or down from, but the wall will have a Defend! instead of a Guard!. If it's a card with a secondary effect like providing information or healing, it'll still go to you, instead of whoever the blocked attack was directed at.
